Hello Ahmed Abbas, I am using a translator so that we can communicate better
I have been looking for someone with this last name Abbas, so when I saw your Facebook profile I decided to add you and write you this message to find out how best we can help each other. I am Mr. Cheong Wee, a bank officer here in Bangkok Thailand with United Oversea Bank (UOB). I think it is God's will for me to meet you now. I have an important business discussion that I would like to share with you which I think will interest you, as it relates to your last name/nationality and you will benefit from it.
One of the late Alan Abbas, a citizen of your country who was in the gold business here in Bangkok, has a fixed deposit with my bank in the year 2007 for 108 calendar months, in the amount of $5,500,000.00 (Five Million Five Hundred US Dollars) at the date The last filing was on the 22nd of January 2014. Unfortunately, Alan Abbas was among the victims in the recent plane crash in Russia involving sixty-two passengers in the central region of Rostov-on-Don.
My bank management did not know after his death, I knew about this because I was his account officer. He did not mention any of the crown prince's relatives when the account was opened, and he was not married, and no relative was found for him. Last week, my bank management held a meeting to conduct the bank verification process to take note of the inactive and abandoned deposit accounts. I know this will happen and that is why I have been looking for a way to deal with the situation, because if the directors of the bank find out about his death, the bank will transfer the money to their directors to participate. So I don't want this to happen. That's why when I saw your details, I was happy.
I am now seeking your co-operation to present you as the “next of Kin/Heir” to the account, since you have the same last name and same nationality with him, and the bank headquarters will release the account through my assistance. There is no risk involved; The transaction will be carried out under a legitimate arrangement that protects you from any breach of law. It is better to demand the money than to allow the directors of the bank to divert it and share it among themselves. I'm not a greedy person, so I suggest we share the money with you, 50/50% for you and me respectively. I hope my share of the money will help me to start my own company which was my dream. Let me know what you think about this and please treat this information confidentially. I will give you more details as soon as I receive your urgent response through my personal email address below.
